duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform scrubbing during surgical procedures, ensuring sterile techniques and adherence to safety protocols.
Assist in general surgeries, traumas, orthopedics, OBGYN, and Endoscopies, maintaining a high standard of patient care.
Take call duty as required, responding promptly to assist the surgical team in emergency cases.

education_certification.credential: Certification in Operating Room / Scrub Technology
